participant_1.name: Ethan
participant_1.personality: Creative and analytical, Ethan enjoys expressing himself through poetry while also being competitive in sports.
participant_1.background: i played football for a division a college. i enjoy poetry. i try various coffees as a hobby. i'm a huge star wars fan.

participant_2.name: Sophia

participant_2.background: gymnastics is my favorite sport. my favorite color is yellow. i workout four hours a day. i am a gold medalist olympian. i love italian food and garlic bread.
